terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.text: With less than a month to go before the European Union enacts new consumer privacy laws for its citizens, companies around the world are updating their terms of service agreements to comply.With less than a month to go before the European Union enacts new consumer privacy laws for its citizens, companies around the world are updating their terms of service agreements to comply.With less than a month to go before the European Union enacts new consumer privacy laws for its citizens, companies around the world are updating their terms of service agreements to comply.With less than a month to go before the European Union enacts new consumer privacy laws for its citizens, companies around the world are updating their terms of service agreements to comply.With less than a month to go before the European Union enacts new consumer privacy laws for its citizens, companies around the world are updating their terms of service agreements to comply.With less than a month to go before the European Union enacts new consumer privacy laws for its citizens, companies around the world are updating their terms of service agreements to comply.With less than a month to go before the European Union enacts new consumer privacy laws for its citizens, companies around the world are updating their terms of service agreements to comply.With less than a month to go before the European Union enacts new consumer privacy laws for its citizens, companies around the world are updating their terms of service agreements to comply.With less than a month to go before the European Union enacts new consumer privacy laws for its citizens, companies around the world are updating their terms of service agreements to comply.

errors.valid:
At least 8 characters
Min one lowercase and uppercase latter
Min one number

texts.registration_2: Please fill in all fields to register your account. All fields are mandatory. You will receive a confirmation email to the address you indicate when registering.
texts.forgot_password: Please enter the email address which you used when registering. A password reset link will be sent to this address.
texts.forgot_password_2: A password reset link has been sent to your email. Please use it to reset your password.
texts.ask_partner: Click the button below to be redirected to our friendly Telegram bot, who will ask you several questions to match you with a referring partner best suited for you.
